Posts.Content: Haa210 wrote: I asked this in a reply to my previous thread but wanted to post again just in case. How fast to the visual symptoms of IBC typically progress? Is it likely to have a rash that stays the same for weeks before it gets bigger, the skin dimples, swelling starts, etc. or do things escalate faster than that? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: IBC questions - how fast do symptoms usually progress? Haa210 Kicks
